name: Trigger "Research+" Label Inbox -> Extract Link -> Research Article -> Put Data in GSheets

parameters.name: markSeen
parameters.label: Mark email message(s) as read when fetched

messages.content: You are a helpful intelligent assistant

You're task is to extract the website link URL from the email body data.

Just output the complete website link URL.

Input email body:
{{1.text}}

messages.content: You are a helpful intelligent research assistant

Summarize in 30 words the content coming from the site: {{9.result}} . 
Ignore other sources. Also get the exact title of the content usually in headers.

The summary should be less than 30 words.

The final output should have:
-the Title coming from the website article.
-the 30 word summary
You are a helpful intelligent assistant

You're task is to extract the Title of the article coming from an input data.

Just output the Title in plain text and nothing else.

Input data:
{{3.choices[].message.content}}
